Golin is the Relevance Agency: an integrated agency with PR, digital and content at its core. With 50 offices around the world and more than 60 years of experience, Golin’s purpose is to create change through relevant, brave work worthy of awe and action. “Go All In” is the agency’s ethos and commitment to bravery over mediocrity. We do things differently.
Using our revolutionary g4 model, our specialist communities use proprietary tools to plan and execute powerful campaigns designed to create positive change for our clients.
